articles.title: 19 Products Teachers Say Make The School Year Easier
articles.author: Emily Shwake
articles.summary: Amazon offers a variety of products that could be considered to be new products or services for the classroom, including an electric stapler with a 45-sheet capacity; a label maker for organizing; a Cricut Joy bundle for crafting elaborate labels, custom bulletin board décor, and DIY sticker prizes; a self-sharpening paper trimmer; and a folding utility cart. These items are intended to increase classroom productivity, organization, and efficiency.

articles.title: Titanium Milanese Apple Watch Series 11 Just Hit the Amazon Low at Nearly $90 Off, but You Can Get the Ultra 3 for Less
articles.summary: Apple Watch Series 11, a new smartwatch by Apple, has been tested. The new features are providing more enjoyment. However, it is not a revolutionary model, but rather a slight improvement.

articles.title: 28 Home Products That Understood The Assignment
articles.author: Daysha Edewi
articles.summary: The content introduces a variety of household products aimed at solving everyday problems. These include the Windex outdoor glass cleaner, a WD-40 pen, Bissell Little Green machine, a ceiling fan carbon filter, and Snug Plugs, each designed to enhance cleaning efficiency or improve home functionality. The article focuses on practical solutions and upgrades for cleaning and household tasks.

articles.title: PHP Domain & Hosting Signup Software for Web Hosting and Domain Reseller Businesses
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart introduces a web hosting order system with features like domain availability and WHOIS RDAP checker. It supports domain registration and transfer, IDN converter API, AI domain suggestion with registrar API, and multi-currency support. domainCart also includes 25+ payment gateway options.

articles.title: Wyoming Trucks Celebrates 25 Years of Success
articles.author: James Riter
articles.summary: Wyoming Trucks expanded its services in 2015 with the opening of Wyoming Trucks Wash and Lube, a full-service car wash and oil change facility. This new facility was designed to alleviate the workload on the main service department.

articles.title: 27 Space-Saving Products For Family Homes
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Sproos is introducing a handheld showerhead with various funky color options to liven up the shower. RabbitAir has introduced a HEPA air purifier that is super versatile, can be hung on the wall or set against it and has compatible front panels through their site if you want to mix it up as part of your decor. Keurig is launching K-Mini single serve coffee maker.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip7 Deal: Is a Folding Phone Worth It?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 is introduced as a leading folding phone with a compelling price drop, aluminum construction, robust hinge, and a manageable weight.  It boasts a 4.1-inch cover screen with 120Hz refresh rate and 2,600 nits brightness, allowing for full functionality without unfolding the device. The phone also has a 6.9-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display protected by Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2 for multitasking.

articles.title: FaZhiRecipe Shampoo 530ml flagship store, which FaZhiRecipe shampoo is best to use
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: The shampoo 'Hair Recipe' 530ml is experiencing a surge in popularity. Advertisements highlight the shampoo's high-quality ingredients, mild formula, and promise of healthy, shiny hair. The brand emphasizes authenticity and a worry-free shopping experience.

articles.title: Polygant Launches AI-Powered Real Estate CRM Platform for GCC Developers
articles.summary: Polygant launched its Real Estate CRM platform, an AI-driven solution designed to streamline operations and enhance customer engagement for property developers. The platform offers features such as an interactive property catalog, real-time data synchronization, and cryptocurrency payment integration, primarily targeting the GCC markets. Polygant's platform enables developers to manage properties, sales, and customer interactions more efficiently.

articles.title: McDonald's adds 2 new items to its menu for a limited time
articles.author: Luke Peteley
articles.summary: McDonald's introduced two new menu items nationwide: a Buffalo Ranch Sauce, described as a blend of bold and creamy flavors available from November 3rd and incorporated into several items like the Buffalo Ranch Snack Wrap, and a CHIPS AHOY! Frappé, composed of a Mocha Frappé base, chocolate chip cookie flavored syrup, whipped cream, and CHIPS AHOY! cookie pieces.

articles.title: Walmart's ‘Luxurious' $18 8-Piece Spa Set Will Make a ‘Heartfelt Gift' This Holiday Season
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A new product offering includes an eye mask, loofah, lotion, and shower gel.

articles.title: Fleurieu Milk Company has features in world-first milk traceability project
articles.author: Hui Jin
articles.summary: Fleurieu Milk allows customers to scan a traceable QR code on their milk containers using their phone. This enables product traceability through the company's service.

articles.title: I want to use digital notebooks, but they're not for me
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: ReMarkable has introduced the Paper Pro, a new note-taking tablet featuring color E Ink and front lighting, priced at $579. The tablet offers lower latency and a larger display, targeting users who prefer handwritten notes and a distraction-free environment.

articles.title: It dries my hair in seconds - Shark hairdyer now on sale for Black Friday
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Shark reduced the price of Shark SpeedStyle Pro FLEX 4-in-1 High-Velocity Hairdryer from £199.99 to £159.99 on the Shark website for Black Friday. AO also sells the hairdryer for £158, or £148 for members. The hairdryer features a folding handle, four styling attachments, and a 'scalp shield' mode.

articles.title: New to The Street to Broadcast Show Number 698 on Bloomberg - Saturday, November 8, 2025, at 6:30 PM EST
articles.author: New To The Street
articles.summary: Lantern Pharma's CEO, Panna Sharma, will discuss the company's progress in AI-driven oncology and precision-medicine drug development using its RADR® platform during an interview on 'New to The Street'. The broadcast will air on Bloomberg Television this Saturday, November 8, 2025.

articles.title: 57 Kitchen Products That Are Totally Worth The Space
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of the Always Pan 2.0 from Our Place, a nonstick ceramic pan designed to replace ten pieces of cookware, featuring oven-safe capabilities up to 450°F. It also introduces the Instant Vortex Plus 6-in-1 Air Fryer from the makers of the Instant Pot, which can air fry, roast, broil, bake, reheat, and dehydrate food.

articles.title: This Luxury SUV Lets You Take a Hot Shower Wherever You Like
articles.author: Pablo Salapantan
articles.summary: IM Motors, a Chinese automaker, introduced the LS9, a luxury SUV featuring a long range and a built-in car shower. The LS9 includes multiple screens, a Bang & Olufsen sound system, and 4D massage features. During the pre-order phase, the company received 8,000 reservations within 30 minutes.

articles.title: Discussions forcused on AI-driven innovation
articles.author: Vn Economy
org: Ho Chi Minh City Department of Science and Technology
articles.summary: Base.vn is testing two AI agents within a large construction corporation's bidding segment to reduce the time for processing applications, analyzing capabilities, and comparing documents. These AI agents are integrated with core operational processes and intended to deliver real profit to the company.

articles.title: 37 Better Versions Of Products You Use All The Time
articles.author: Karly Jacklin
articles.summary: The article highlights numerous recently released products spanning various categories. These include the RobeCurls heatless hair curler for achieving heatless blowouts, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel designed to reduce eye puffiness, and the EasyWring microfiber spin mop for easier floor cleaning. The article provides a snapshot of different companies innovations in 2023.

articles.title: I Asked 3 Chefs for Their Favorite Store-Bought Chicken Noodle Soup—and Now I'll Only Buy This Brand
articles.author: Karla Walsh
articles.summary: Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup is favored for its broth-to-filling ratio, thick noodles, and real-looking vegetables. Rao's Homemade Chicken Noodle Soup, found in glass jars, is noted for its rich, herby broth and unique ingredients like cheese. The Chefs have recommended Progresso and Rao's Chicken Noodle Soup as a great alternative for Campbell's soup.

articles.title: These Moisturizing Hand Soaps Are Like Mini Spa Treatments
articles.author: Lily Wohlner
articles.summary: The article highlights several moisturizing hand washes from various companies. Homecourt's hand wash, founded by Courteney Cox, features argan oil and Australian hibiscus flower. Native launched liquid hand soaps with scents like Coconut & Vanilla. Other highlighted brands include Flamingo Estate, Youth To The People, Aesop, Grown Alchemist, Evolvetogether, Naomi, D.S. & Durga, Compagnie de Provence, and Hotel Lobby, each offering unique formulations and scents.

articles.title: Yummy Rice Noodle Launches Online Ordering with Third-Parties
articles.author: Editor In Chief
articles.summary: Yummy Rice Noodle has launched online ordering and delivery services through eOrderSTL, DoorDash, Grubhub, and Uber Eats. This expansion aims to make its dishes more accessible to customers across the St. Louis area. Customers can now place pickup or delivery orders directly through Yummy Rice Noodle's website or through the delivery platforms.

articles.title: Taylor Swift Praised This 'Very Creamy' $5 Lipstick
articles.author: Taylor Lane
articles.summary: CoverGirl's Exhibitionist Lipstick in shade 305, a classic red hue, is used by Taylor Swift. The lipstick, priced at $5 on Amazon, contains shea butter and avocado oil for hydration and smooth application, resulting in a creamy texture that customers rave about.

articles.title: Think Twice Before Buying Cinnamon Rolls From A Grocery Store Bakery Again
articles.author: Deb Kavis
articles.summary: Immaculate Baking Company's Organic Cinnamon Rolls can be baked for a fulfilling dessert. Duncan Hines Creamy Cream Cheese Flavored Frosting can be enhanced with cinnamon extract for a more flavorful pastry experience.

articles.title: Amazon launches Bazaar App in Nigeria, expanding haul's ultra low-price shopping experience
articles.author: thecableng
articles.summary: Amazon launched its 'Amazon Bazaar' app in Nigeria and 14 other new destinations. The app provides affordable products across fashion, home, and lifestyle categories, with most items under NGN15,000. New customers receive 50% off their first order, with free delivery for orders reaching NGN30,000.

articles.title: The runaway success of SnooZip
articles.author: Square1
articles.summary: SnooZip, an Irish sleepwear brand created by Aisling Ryan, is now available in Carrolls stores across the country. The brand is also sold online to over 40 countries, expanding its product reach.

articles.title: 38 Bathroom Upgrades That Feel Like Magic
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The content introduces various new bathroom products, including a HairyGrabster for catching hair in the shower, a waterfall faucet compatible with different sink types, a space-creating Sink Topper for beauty products, a bamboo Squatty Potty for improved toilet posture, and The ToiletShroom, a multi-functional toilet tool. Other highlighted items include a minty jelly frog soap, a soft-close trash can, and Scrubbing Bubbles toilet cleaning stamps.

articles.title: Local Event: Trout Quintet Schubert
articles.summary: HZY Goods Dispensary is now open in East Orange. TG Counseling offers NJ telehealth and in-person therapy services. Dogtopia provides dog daycare, boarding, spa, and wellness services.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 arriving on November 13 with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and 165Hz display
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: OnePlus will globally launch the OnePlus 15 on November 13, featuring a 6.78-inch 1.5K LTPO display with a 165Hz refresh rate and powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5. The phone includes a 7300mAh battery with 120W wired and 50W wireless charging, and is designed with a 360° Cryo-Velocity Cooling System for heat management.

articles.title: Amazon Extends Low-price Shopping Experience to Nigeria with New App
articles.author: Life
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the Amazon Bazaar app in Nigeria and 14 other destinations, offering affordable products across fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. This app, part of the global Amazon Haul shopping experience, provides an ultra-low price shopping experience and interactive entertainment features, with most items under N15,000 and free delivery for orders over N30,000.

articles.title: Amazon Extends Low-price Shopping Experience to Nigeria with New App
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Amazon launched the Amazon Bazaar app in Nigeria. The app provides a new shopping experience with hundreds of thousands of affordable products across fashion, home, and lifestyle categories.

articles.title: Ugg Boots and Slippers Are on Sale for Up to 60% Off
articles.author: Rylee Johnston
articles.summary: Amazon is offering deals on Ugg and Koolaburra by Ugg products, including Ugg Neumel X Boots, Ugg Classic Ultra Mini New Heights Boots and Koolaburra by Ugg Burree Platform Slippers. These deals are available for a limited time, with sizes selling out quickly.

articles.title: 25 Target Dresses Perfect A Special Occasion
articles.author: Isabella Sarlija
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new dress styles, including a satin flutter-sleeve dress, a boat-neck dress, a midi button-up dress, and a ruched mini dress, among others. These dresses cater to different occasions and preferences, such as weddings, cocktail events, and casual outings, highlighting features like comfortable fabrics, vintage aesthetics, and inclusive sizing options.

articles.title: DGX Spark: Cyberpunk 2077 Runs – But Don't Expect Much!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Box64 allows running x86-64 games on NVIDIA DGX systems, which typically use ARM64 processors. This technology makes it possible for cloud gaming providers to use ARM-based servers and creates new opportunities for game developers to bring their games to ARM-based platforms without full native ports.

articles.title: Amazon unveils ‘Kindle Translate' to help authors publish books in multiple languages
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Kindle Translate, a new AI-based service for Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP) authors to translate eBooks into multiple languages. Currently in beta, it supports translations between English and Spanish, along with German-to-English. The translated eBooks will be listed on the Amazon store with a Kindle Translate label.

articles.title: Win limited edition SKIN functional goodies
articles.author: Candyce Krishna
articles.summary: SKIN functional is launching a cosmetic bag and a festive advent calendar, which contains mini must-have skincare products like cleansers, serums, moisturizers, and sunscreen. The cosmetic bag includes products like 3.5% Hyaluronic Acid + 3% Peptides + NMF – Hydration Juice and 5% Hydroxypinacolone Retinoate – Retinoic Acid Ester, and the advent calendar includes products like 2% Amino Acid – Gentle Gel Cleanser and 20% Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate – Oil-Based Vitamin C.

articles.title: Johnson's Baby launches refreshed range and ‘It's Pure Love' campaign with Sonam & Anil Kapoor
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Johnson's Baby has refreshed its India portfolio with upgraded formulations containing ingredients like aloe vera and vitamin B5, new packaging made with 50% post-consumer recycled plastic, and a new brand mascot, 'The Iconic Drop'. The company also launched a new communication platform 'It's Pure Love' to align with the evolving expectations of new age parents.

articles.title: Review: I put three vacuum cleaners to the test in a busy home
articles.author: RTÉ Lifestyle
articles.summary: Dyson released the V16 Piston Animal vacuum cleaner with a Hyperdymium 900W motor and dual conical cleaner head. Shark introduced the PowerDetect Clean & Empty Cordless Pet Vacuum Cleaner with a self-emptying system. Dreame launched the R20 Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, offering an affordable option with good performance on hard floors.

articles.title: NOVALUXIA Summit: From communities to the center of the digital economy
articles.author: INQUIRER.net
articles.summary: NOVALUXIA introduced the NOVA-LIGHT Women Empowerment Program and the NOVA Leadership Institute to enhance digital economy inclusion. The company's 2026–2028 Strategic Vision includes establishing 100 User Operation Centers nationwide and enabling one million households to participate in the digital economy. NOVALUXIA also plans to collaborate with local brands to generate jobs and entrepreneurship opportunities.

articles.title: 43 Useful Products You'll Be Glad Exist When You Do
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products. Batiste introduced Sweat Activated Dry Shampoo, and Eos launched a limited-edition Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. Baseus released the Picogo power bank, while Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash.

articles.title: Cebu Pacific bolsters fleet with new A320neo ahead of holiday travel surge
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Cebu Pacific received a new Airbus A320neo aircraft. The addition will support the airline's expansion plans.

articles.title: Ted's Just Made Crème Brûlée Into Pizza
articles.summary: Ted's is introducing a new product: a crème brûlée pizza. This innovative pizza combines a Neapolitan base with vanilla custard cream and torched sugar, merging their popular crème brûlée dessert with their best-selling pizza.

articles.title: 41 Home Finds To Make Your Guests Want To Redecorate
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Dreame launched a cordless 2-in-1 vacuum and mop featuring self-propelling, self-drying, and self-cleaning capabilities. Simplehuman introduced both an under-the-cabinet trash system and a hands-free stainless-steel trash can, noted for its ease of installation and cleaning.

articles.title: Kylie Cosmetics strengthens its India footprint, goes live on Nykaa
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Kylie Cosmetics is expanding its presence in India by launching its products on Nykaa. This collaboration aims to leverage Nykaa's platform to reach a wider customer base in the Indian market and drive awareness.  Additionally, Kylie Cosmetics will be featured at Nykaaland 3.0 from November 7 to 9, showcasing new launches and interactive experiences.

articles.title: Best 5 star washing machines: Top 10 picks for spotless clothes and lower bill from trusted brands
articles.summary: Samsung launched an 8 kg 5-star Fully-Automatic Top Load Washing Machine with Eco Bubble technology and a Digital Inverter Motor, while LG introduced a 7 kg 5-star Semi-Automatic Top Load Washing Machine with Wind Jet Dry technology. IFB released the Executive SXN 9014K with AI intelligence and 9 swirl wash technology; other brands, including Godrej, Haier, Bosch, Voltas Beko and VW, are compared with details on various models and features.

articles.title: LoveShop.ai Launches Ultimate AI Shopping Assistant
articles.author: Ethan Lin
articles.summary: LoveShop.ai introduced its AI-powered shopping assistant, designed to streamline online shopping by aggregating products from multiple retailers like Amazon and eBay. The platform offers features such as personalized recommendations, deal tracking, and a unified search across various online stores, available on web, iOS, and Android.

articles.title: Johnson's Baby unveils upgraded, sustainable range and 'It's Pure Love' campaign with Anil and Sonam Kapoor
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Johnson's Baby has launched an upgraded range of baby products featuring advanced skin-science based formulations and sustainable packaging made with 50% Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) plastic. The launch is supported by the 'It's Pure Love' campaign featuring Anil and Sonam Kapoor, focusing on the bonding moments between parents and babies.

articles.title: inne Debuts at CIIE with Global Launch of Two New Products
articles.author: inne
articles.summary: inne debuted at CIIE. inne launched two new products globally.

articles.title: Lavnlux Introduces The Porto, a Patented Luxury Spa and Shower Innovation
articles.summary: Lavnlux announces the launch of The Porto by Lavnlux, a luxury spa and shower product designed for comfort, privacy, and total relaxation. The Porto features a removable shower rain shield, Bluetooth connectivity with waterproof stereo speakers, and a USB-C charging port. It will be available in Fall 2026, with pre-orders opening soon at Lavnlux.

articles.title: Canadian Mushroom Company Announces $2,000 Holiday Giveaway
articles.summary: Nature Lion Inc. has launched its largest-ever customer giveaway, featuring a $2,000 shopping spree contest.  The giveaway promotes Nature Lion's mushroom grow-at-home kits and Shyne Coffee, while rewarding customer loyalty and attracting new participants. This campaign emphasizes investing marketing dollars directly into its community instead of traditional advertising.

articles.title: Windows 11 Start Menu: Enable the New Look Now!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft has introduced a revamped Start Menu for Windows 11, initially part of the 25H2 feature update, offering a full application list, expanded category options, and a responsive layout.  Users can enable these features early using tools like ViVeTool, fostering a closer relationship between Microsoft and its user base.

articles.title: Move over mulled wine — Aldi's £7.49 drink is the superior winter tipple
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Aldi is introducing a new wine. This product is presented as a must-try alternative to traditional festive favorites.

articles.title: Sir David Beckham fans can get large bottle of 'sexy' aftershave for 33p at Superdrug
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: TopCashback offers the Instinct fragrance for only 33p after cashback to new customers who sign up for their service. This is a promotional offer to attract new users to TopCashback.
